subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The teaching pro Del Snyder, who has been helping golfers play better since the 1950s, has an easy cure for short-game woes. It’s not what club you hit, but where you grip that club.
snippet: The teaching pro Del Snyder, who has been helping golfers play better since the 1950s, has an easy cure for short-game woes. It’s not what club you hit, but where you grip that club.
